text: Heterodactylus lundii, Lund's teiid, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==Etymology== The specific name, lundii, is in honor of Danish paleontologist Peter Wilhelm Lund.Beolens, Bo; Watkins, Michael; Grayson, Michael (2011). The Eponym Dictionary of Reptiles. Baltimore: Johns Hopkins University Press. xiii + 296 pp. . (Heterodactylus lundii, pp. 162-163). ==References== Category:Heterodactylus Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 1862 Category:Taxa named by Johannes Theodor Reinhardt Category:Taxa named by Christian Frederik Lütken
title: Heterodactylus lundii
